name: Space Fury
description:
If you are a fan of retro space games, this is the right casual game for you.

Blast away through waves of asteroids, space mines and hordes of alien ships in this epic frenetic shooter.Characteristics:
- Endless frenzy
- Power ups
- Retro art style
- Retro sound effects

How to play:

W/S: Move
A/D: Change direction
Q/E: Strafe
Space: Shoot
R: Reset
Esc: Pause / Unpause

Also available for Android on Google Play.

Available languages:
- English, French, Spanish, Portuguese.

How many enemies can you take down?Unleash your Fury!
